text21: Use this tool to find pairs that don't automatically appear in the interface.
text22: When you add liquidity, you are given pool tokens representing your position. These tokens automatically earn fees proportional to your share of the pool, and can be redeemed at any time.
text23: Removing pool tokens converts your position back into underlying tokens at the current rate, proportional to your share of the pool. Accrued fees are included in the amounts you receive.
text24: Connect to a wallet to find pools
text25: Select a token to find your liquidity
text26: These tokens are commonly paired with other tokens.
text27: You are the first liquidity provider.
text28: The ratio of tokens you add will set the price of this pool.
text29: Once you are happy with the rate click supply to review.
text30: By adding liquidity you'll earn 0.2% of all trades on this pair proportional to your share of the pool. Fees are added to the pool, accrue in real time and can be claimed by withdrawing your liquidity.

tex114: The invitation rebate reward (HECO) during {{date}} has been distributed.Because of the data latency of the BSC block, the invitation  rebate reward on BSC has not been issued temporarily, and the distribution time will be released on the official MDEX announcement.We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused and appreciate your understanding.
text115:
Each transaction needs to pay a 0.3% transaction fee, of which
-Liquidity providers: 0.2%
-Contribution to the repurchase fund pool: 0.07%
-Contribution to reward pool of the boardroom: 0.03%
